1897.last_action: Referred to LAB, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 4
1897.title: Relating To Civil Rights.
1897.description: Prohibits discrimination against any individual in selection, termination, terms, or conditions of an internship or training program because of the individual's race, sex including gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, age, religion, color, ancestry, disability, marital status, arrest and court record, or reproductive health decision.

2722.last_action: This measure has been deleted from the meeting scheduled on Tuesday 03-17-20 8:30AM in conference room 329.
2722.title: Requesting The Collection Of Sexual Orientation And Gender Identity Information By The Department Of Health Via The Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System, And By The Department Of Education Via The Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance System.
2722.description: Requesting The Collection Of Sexual Orientation And Gender Identity Information By The Department Of Health Via The Behavioral Risk Factor Surveillance System, And By The Department Of Education Via The Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance System.

2989.last_action: Received notice of discharge of all House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 363).
2989.title: Relating To Criminal Defense.
2989.description: Establishes a post-conviction relief task force to review and propose potential updates to Hawaii's laws and court rules regarding post-conviction relief. (SB2 HD1)

3598.title: Relating To Gender Identity.
3598.description: Prohibits conversion therapy for sexual orientation and gender identity. (SB674 HD1)
